title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1762/96 of 11 September 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 2939/94 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 105/76 on the recognition of producers' organizations in the fishing industry
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1762/96 of 11 September 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 2939/94 laying down detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 105/76 on the recognition of producers' organizations in the fishing industry
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 September 1996.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
